channel.title: CrisisX
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg159/_ayo/crisisbanner.png[/img][/center]
[b]Requirements: [/b]
[ul][*]A working microphone with Ventrilo [*]A vast knowledge of Java both in Private Servers and in Java programming [*]A lot of time on your hands, at least 2 hours a day programming and discussing the server with me (Mark) [*]Being at least 16 years old, mature and professional [*]A passion for RSPS[/ul]
[b]Intro:[/b]
Hello, welcome to the CrisisX development thread. First off, I would like to start off by telling you who I am. My name is Mark and I am the owner of one of the most popular private servers: CrisisX. I am currently looking for a few experienced coders. CrisisX has had sponsorship on Mopar for a few months not too long ago. That's basically the summary.
[u]Based On[/u]: RiotScape with a lot of Project Insanity [u]Client[/u]: 474 Client
[b]Open Positions: [/b]
Content Developer (Fixing Bugs/Glitches, Adding Content (Minigames, Weapons etc.)
[b]Application Form:[/b]
[code]Name: Experience: Time Zone/Activity: Why I am interested: [/code]
[b]Contact:[/b]
Please private message me on this forum with your MSN after you post your forum on THIS topic.
[b]Rewards:[/b]
[ul][*]Monetary gain [*]Experience (That can be put on things like a college application) [*]One of the most respectful positions on the server, controlling thousands of players [*]A fun social environment[/ul]
Regards, Mark

item.title: CrisisX
item.dc:creator: @apocalypsePK apocalypsePK
item.description:
@apocalypsePK wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:52, topic:333533”]CrisisX hm… A well-known server. Usually 300-450 players on at a time, yet you’re, what? Number 7?
Can’t get your players to vote hm?
Voting or not, he’s still got a pretty damn popular server going on.
But, to my knowledge, he’s not hiring anyone at the moment.
So, I won’t bother to create an application until further notice.[/quote]

yeah? its still worth a try though

Read full topic

item.title: CrisisX
item.dc:creator: @apocalypsePK apocalypsePK
item.description:
@apocalypsePK wrote:

Name:John/Johnny
Experience: 4 years rsps coding ect. owning alot of servers being mod all the basic stuff and more.
Time Zone/Activity: EST/ 3 hours+ a day
Why I am interested:Well im not 16 yet but my future goal in my life is to be a game developer/graphic artist and i think that this can help me out. I just started high school and im doing really well at an 80 average although that proves nothing. I just love rsps’s and i want to be apart of this it will be fun and exciting experience and i will be able to learn and it will help me in school too.
